entry.title: Combined summary - TestNet block starved?
entry.summary: Danny's inquiry has revealed that there have been no blocks for almost two hours in TestNet. This information has been verified by multiple block explorers, including blockr.io and Danny's own bitcoin node. Prior to the last block (530516), there were many blocks with zero transactions and only occasional blocks with a high volume of transactions.The cause of this issue is currently unknown and it is uncertain if any additional information is available. It is unclear whether this is a temporary glitch or a more serious problem that needs to be addressed. The lack of activity in TestNet may affect those who use it for testing purposes.It is important to monitor the situation and gather more information to determine the cause of the problem. In the meantime, individuals should exercise caution when using TestNet and consider using alternative platforms for their testing needs.
